possible_conditions.name: Tension Headache (Shiroroga)
possible_conditions.description: Tension-type headache caused by stress, poor posture, or nervous system imbalance
possible_conditions.ayurvedic_perspective: Vata imbalance affecting the nervous system and causing constriction in head region

possible_conditions.name: Anxiety and Stress (Chittodvega)
possible_conditions.description: Mental agitation and excessive worry affecting nervous system and mind
possible_conditions.ayurvedic_perspective: Vata imbalance causing instability in mind and nervous system, affecting Prana Vata

immediate_actions: Apply warm sesame oil to scalp and temples
Drink warm chamomile or brahmi tea
herbal_remedies: Ashwagandha for stress and anxiety relief
Brahmi for mental clarity and calmness
recommendations.when_to_consult_doctor: If headaches are severe, sudden, or accompanied by vision changes, confusion, or neck stiffness

dosha_imbalance.description: Vata dosha imbalance is causing instability and irregularity in your body. This affects movement, circulation, and nervous system function, leading to headache, stress and related discomfort
